snippet: Advertising dollars have been pouring into South Carolina in recent days, which after Iowa, is shaping up to be the next front in the advertising wars.
abstract: Campaign groups are pouring money into political ads for the upcoming primary in South Carolina, which, after Iowa, is shaping up to be the next state in the advertising wars between the Republican presidential candidates.
lead_paragraph: Advertising dollars have been pouring into South Carolina in recent days, which after Iowa, is shaping up to be the next front in the advertising wars.

headline.seo: Campaigns Spend Big on South Carolina Ads
headline.main: Ad Battle Heats Up for Contest in South
headline.print_headline: Ad Battle Heats Up For Contest In South
